text: 'in aladhin amanuu biallah warasulih mhmd salaa allah ealayh wasalam walyhwd walsaabiiyn whm: (qwm baqwn ealaa ftrthm wala din muqarar lahum ytbewnh) walnsara walmajus (whm ebdt alnar) waladhin 'ashrakuu whm: ebdt alawthan, 'inn allah yafsil baynahum jmyeana yawm alqiamat fydkhl almuminin aljnt, wayadkhul alkafirin alnar, 'iina allah ealaa kl shay' shhyd, shahid 'aemal aleabbad kllaha, wahsaha whfzha, wsyjazy kla bima yastahiqu jaza'an wfaqana lil'aemal alty emlwha
